original_title: Why Should You Have All The Fun?
overview: Paul is over at his best friend Dave's house when Dave blurts out that he had sex with his stepmom, Sharon! Paul is shocked and at first, doesn't believe Dave. They always joked about Sharon having a thing for Dave, but they never actually BELIEVED it...  Clara and Beth, sitting across from each other at a table. Beth remarks anxiously that Spencer is late again, and hopes that they won't have to wait as long this time. For their last joint prayer session, he was TWO HOURS late. Finally, Spencer arrives. It quickly becomes clear that he is married to both Clara and Beth. To their shock, he says that the reason for his lateness is that he's been seeing another woman, and he wants to make her his third wife...
title: Why Should You Have All The Fun?
